extendedInfo.description: Know the GPS Tide Prediction as Easily as the Time. Works as a tide chart/table/graph but in a wristwatch format.  USA/Worldwide high & low tides, moon/sun positions instantly for your very location. Retrieves data from 9400+ worldwide stations using NOAA and UKHO feeds.# 1 TOP TIDE App on Google Play Now Available for iPad (titled- Tide:Tidal Chronoscope)#2 TOP NEW RANKED Google Play Weather categoryTOP 1% of All Paid Apps on iTunes#1 NEW & NOTEWORTHY iTunes Navigation Sept 2011 Featured WHATâS HOT iTunes Navigation Sept/Oct/Nov 2011 TOP 10 RANKED iTunes Navigation Oct/Nov 2011 #2 TOP RANKED UK iTunes Navigation Nov 2011#4 TOP Charts iPad Navigation CategoryThe ChronGlobal Tidal Chronoscope, using the location services of your Android device, provides an intuitive depiction of present and future tides for 9400+ USA and worldwide tide stations, with the look and feel of the most popular tide watch ever.Instant depiction and details of present and future tide predictions, lunar and solar positions at your location. Our website provides a list of 9400+ USA and International tide stations covered. Perfect for fishing, boating, kayaking, sailing, diving or any other water oriented activity.â³ Automatically retrieves local tide predictions from over 9400+ tide stations in USA and worldwide. Optional manual station selection. â¼ Dedicated watch face for the visual depiction of the tide level at the current time, and up to 7 days into the future. â³ Tidal watch face shows the present tide level and hours to high and low tide, as well as the current moon phase (for predicting neap and spring tides). â¼ Dedicated watch face for the visual depiction of the current moon phase and the relative position of the moon in the sky. â³ Dedicated watch face for the graphical depiction of the relative position of the Sun in the sky. â¼ Set the watch to up to 7 days into the future to see all relevant predictions for that time. â³ Information screen for detailed information about tidal and celestial events for up to 7 days in advance. â¼ GPS based location tracking for accurate local tidal predictions. Adjustable tracking parameters. â³ Favorite tide stations list. â¼ Imperial and metric units. â³ Luxurious depiction and accruements of a fine Swiss watch including time and date. â¼ Makes a great opening screen for your device providing you with instant time, tide, moon and solar movements. â³ Please remember that this application is Not for Navigational Use.Please check the Station List on our website (http://www.chronglobal.com/station-list/) to ensure your country and/or your location is covered.

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great app for my work!
reviews.author: Karen Chen

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Accurate high-tide timing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Requires data connection
reviews.author: Christine C

reviews.title: Didn\'t display the correct tides
reviews.comment: Using galaxy 3, GPS location on.  Nice display.
reviews.author: Anatol Schweizer

reviews.title: Good enough
reviews.comment: Even though it requires data connection.. great app
reviews.author: Fahad Al-Farhan

reviews.title: Much better
reviews.comment: Yup, back to normal operations. For some reason lately connectivity issues ruined an otherwise faultless app. Thanks!
reviews.author: Peter A Stone

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: But does require Internet connection. Not much help if you\'re miles from land. Tide and currents by flyto map has it all.
reviews.author: Peter Buckle

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Nice graphics. Very intuitive. I like it a lot. Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Money
reviews.comment: Parali demosu bombo\305\237
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tide indication
reviews.comment: Only works on GPS therefor no use for distant destination. Only works on present gps location.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, but a bit of a memory hog.
reviews.comment: Excellent app, exactly what a tidal app should do - read the GPS and tell you exactly what the tides are doing where you are.  The interface is quite unique, but easy to get to grips with.  It takes up 7Mb of internal memory, which is painful on my Wildfire S.   Moving it to the SD card is possible with Link2SD (on a rooted phone), but the license failed to verify correctly when I did this, so had to move it back to internal memory. :(
reviews.author: Bill Bennett

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Easy to read & easy to use. Dead-nuts gps accuracy with long island sound tides as well as accurate harbor & upper river areas in the Housy, Saugatuck, & CT rivers. A must-have of u care about accurate reads WHERE YOU ARE FISHING.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great info
reviews.comment: It really is a stellar (if not somewhat pricey) app.
reviews.author: Theresa Chen

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
reviews.comment: Does everything I need, using the gps to get my local ports and the right times. If I had one fault it would be the lack of facility for moving to the SD card.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Elegant and useful
reviews.comment: Uncluttered displays with just the right information and user control.  Would be nice to add a quick reference link to web based navigational tidal charts on the info. page.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice watch
reviews.comment: Great app I love the info it provides. Email off creator helped me find different tidal ports which I thought was not possible. Worthy of 5*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Joe 11/9/9
reviews.comment: Very nice, many locations to choose from  was able to select from my normal local reference ( Harbor Island Bridge, SC ) a relatively obscure location.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent go anywhere app!
reviews.comment: I have installed this app on both my phone and my tablet, it\'s great to know the state of the tide where I launch my PWC, full marks, what\'s next??
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice App!!
reviews.comment: Very cool way to get tidal information on the go. Love the interface and how it\'s tracked to your location.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: radi opasno..:D
